cause.description:
Jean Dean RIF is a project of the Alabama Kiwanis Foundation that began in 1991. RIF provides over 75,000 quality, age appropriate books to over 25,000 at-risk in head starts, even starts, state sponsored day care, and early intervention sites in every county in Alabama.
1. Putting books into children's homes greatly impacts their interest in reading and greatly increases the number who learn to read.
cause.mission: to put quality, age-appropriate books into the hands and homes of at-risk young children before they start kindergarten.
cause.name: Jean Dean RIF
